result.markdown:
::: {.question} **Compounded Annual Return from Semi‑Annual Returns** ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(202) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false library(webexercises) r1 <- rnorm(1, mean = 5, sd = 2) r2 <- rnorm(1, mean = 6, sd = 2) annual_return <- ((1 + r1/100) * (1 + r2/100) - 1) * 100 ``` ::: A stock returned **2.74%** in the first half of the year and **5.12%** in the second half of the year. ::: {.question-block}
✅ Total annual return = (1 + r₁/100) × (1 + r₂/100) − 1 = **8**%.
::: :::
